keyPolicies.policyDescription: Committed to ensuring regeneration chance is not squandered, targeting new houses at international investment markets, and will not involve the housing crisis, with local targeted action.
Champions local businesses of our community, Turhan and the Lib Dems are fighting for local, family businesses.
Lib Dems are improving services across the NHS, with more doctors and 20M extra in early mental health care.
Education is at the top of Turhan's agenda. He will fight to protect libraries so that all children can achieve their full potential.
Cut local crime by tackling crime and fear of crime.
The Lib Dems have blocked Tory plans to let private companies take over schools, allow bosses to fire workers without giving a reason, and pay nurses and teachers less here than in other areas.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Can't win here: Lib Lab Tories down in third here

issues.economy: Turhan believes residents here deserve a stronger economy for their future.
issues.education: Education is at the top of Turhan's agenda. He will fight to protect libraries so that all children can achieve their full potential.
issues.health: Lib Dems are improving services across the NHS, with more doctors and 20M extra in early mental health care.

housing.content: The regeneration challenge facing Tottenham can be a one in a lifetime opportunity benefiting all residents. New houses, targeted at international investment markets, will not solve the housing crisis, with local targeted action.

leaflet.personalStatement: Turhan holds a PhD in engineering and is currently a successful software engineer in the finance industry. Passionate about helping society, keen to contribute to politics and make politics more accessible, and to help young people.

contactInformation.address: Haringey Lib Dems, 62 High Street, London N8 7NX

images.caption: Turhan Ozen working with residents for Tottenham and fighting for local businesses.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Turhan is proud that Liberal Democrats have brought Europe's largest startups to Tottenham and is campaigning for more. He has strong community ties in the UK and across Europe.
